meanings.definition: A small, orange berry that grows in bogs and marshes.
meanings.sent1: I found a ripe bakeapple in the bog.
meanings.sent2: The bakeapple bushes were abundant in the marsh.
meanings.sent3: The bakeapple rolled away when I tried to pick it!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as a bakeapple.
meanings.sent5: The bakeapple's tangy taste lingered on my tongue.

meanings.sent1: We decided to bakeapple together in the afternoon.
meanings.sent2: She loves to bakeapple on sunny days.
meanings.sent3: I bakeappled so much that my basket overflowed!
meanings.sent4: He bakeappled memories from his childhood.
meanings.sent5: The children happily bakeappled in the field.

meanings.definition: The fruit of a plant of the genus Rubus.
meanings.sent1: The bakeapple was juicy and delicious.
meanings.sent2: She made a tasty pie using bakeapples.
meanings.sent3: The bakeapple's bright color stood out in the fruit bowl.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright as a bakeapple in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of bakeapples filled the kitchen.
